sub_title:
Experienced professional in Public & Privet with a passion 4 technology,
trading that connects cultures + opportunities!
summary:
I have been working in a multilingual and multicultural environment such as public and private sectors simultaneously for many years. I am resilient, a fast learner, attentive to detail, well organized and self-motivated professional.
I currently perform administrative functions in a company specializing in export and international travel, as well as the legalization of documents for exporting companies, as well as managing and reviewing the contracts with partners and clients accompanying the process from the beginning to the delivery of the orders to final clients. On top of it, I bring good analytic skills and I have general ability to work with apps and brand new features such as e-commerce tools. 
For the public sector, I worked for the University of Lisbon as Administrative Associate Professional within the cooperation and development areas at the University of Lisbon for five years. It is related to daily administrative tasks such as: increasing the relationship with external actors (other academic institutions, ministries and civil society), supporting the needs of masters and doctoral students, developing policy-relevant and building network with foreign academic institutions in the context of establishing and strengthening mobility programs participated actively in the organization of many events in that academic institution, from national and international conferences, academic events, as well as seasonal celebrations.
Furthermore, I performed at the Brazilian Foreign Policy headquarter in Brasília as an intern back in 2010.
I am just about to conclude a Master Degree in International Relations and International Law from the Institute of Social and Political Sciences, University of Lisbon, and I am seeking a graduate position in The Netherlands. 
Portuguese is my mother tong. I am able to speak fluently English, Spanish. Lately, I have been busy with the Dutch language learning process.

education.degree_name: Post graduation degree of International Relations

education.field_of_study: Political Science; Foreign Policies; Economics; Social Areas

profile_positions.description:
Performed Software (s): SOHO, Order System and, MS Tolls.
* Participate in multi-disciplinary projects that ensure company's policies, procedures and tools are
aligned with the market and enable staff to adequately work in a project organization; Facilitating the
the decision-making process of new and adapted processes and policies to ensure they are fit for the
purpose of the business; To assist with the acquisition and management of our projects and to carry
out strategic marketing and business intelligence activities, i.e. identifying project opportunities at an
early stage; Establishing and maintaining relationships with consular departments of various
embassies and ministries in The Netherlands and abroad; Follow-up and Contracts, Order's
creation from the beginning until the end of the process; Maintain and optimize procedures
of documentation for exportation; Submission of points for improvement regarding the website and the company's app.
profile_positions.title: Foreign Affair Manager

profile_positions.description:
Performed Softwares: SAP-Nova ISO 9001 and ISO 14001, MS Tools, Social Media.
* Monitor the quality status of local sites through quality KPI’s and generate accurate reports and data
analysis base; Conduct projects aiming to incorporate and improve total quality management as well
as the processes of the orders of the company; Perform a variety of functions on fraud status
accounts including: balance reconciliation ensuring the customer is financially whole, processing of
chargebacks on qualifying transactions; Content Management: Look after a broad variety of Safety
Concerns, that to include: Protect Proactively the brand, the e-users, Personal Safety Threats and
Home Safety, Domestic Violence cases; Perform effectively with team members and leadership by
communicating fraud trends by analyzing Social Media or Internal Tools in order to share ideas and
knowledge in a constructive and positive manner; Communicate and involve relevant analyses to
respond escalations and incidents (risk, fraud, and security)...
profile_positions.title: Quality Manager Cyber Risk Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Administration
Softwares Performed: World, Excel sheets, PowerPoint.
* Carry out high-quality, policy-relevant and building the bridge with foreign universities in the context

profile_positions.title: Cooperation and Development Area - Administrative Associate Professional
